resources.string:
"Frequently asked questions 


"
"Question: What is the difference between the different levels?
" "Answer 
" "Each level has a different amounts of words and amount of categorization of the words and timer length. 

" "EASY - 100% OF THE WORDS, 4 Categories and 20 minutes 
" "NORMAL - 100% OF THE WORDS, 3 Categories and 18 minutes 
 " "HARD - 75% OF THE WORDS, 3 Categories and 16 minutes 
" "INSANE - 50% OF THE WORDS, 2 Categories and 14 minutes 
" "IMPOSSIBLE - 25% OF THE WORDS, 0 Categories and 12 minutes 


"
"Question: How many attempts do I get to guess the song? 
" "Answer:
" "You get 5 attempts, regardless if you play timed or not 


" "Question: How is the score calculated? 
" "Answer:
" "Each "success" at the different levels contributes in the following way Easy - 1 points per success 
 Medium - 2 points per success 
 Hard - 3 points per success 
 Insane - 4 points per success 
 Impossible - 5 points per success 
 


" "Question: What do I need to play this game? 
" "Answer:
" "You need a working data connection (preferably 4G for speed) and GPS enabled, you must also give the app permission for location services 


"
"Question: How many songs are there? 
" "Answer:
" "Currently there are 22 songs, although we are adding new songs all the time! Don't worry, the app will update automatically when this happens :-)


"
"Question: Can this app work offline? 
" "Answer:
" "Not exactly, if you have a connection until the markers are in place that is fine, but you can only complete that game, You cannot load another game - including reloading the same level - unless you have a data connection, you also need location services at all times (otherwise its not much of a location puzzle game) 


"
"Question: I am still having issues/ how do I give feedback? 
" "Answer:
" "Please email me on my email address: mahbub@iftekhar.co.uk 
 I will be happy to get feedback and or help you with any issues you may be having. Please allow 2 working days for a reply. 


"
Turn on 3G/4G, then click "Home" \n You also require GPS to be enabled
